transcript.text: think you know Nome Chomsky think again
let's uncover seven surprising facts
about this genius Fact one did you know
Nom Chomsky published his first article
at just 10 years old talk about a child
prodigy Fact Two Chomsky is not just a
linguist he's also a political Rebel
he's been a vocal critic of US foreign
policy for decades fact three fluent in
multiple languages Chomsky can dissect
and discuss linguistic structures in
several tongues multilingual Mastery
anyone fact four he made groundbreaking
contributions to computational Theory
he's basically a coding wizard too
fact five ever heard of the Chomsky
hierarchy it's a classification of
languages that's a Cornerstone in
theoretical computer science fact six
chomsky's work has influenced Fields as
diverse as psychology anthropology and
cognitive science he's a true
interdisciplinary icon fact seven
despite all his academic Fame Chomsky is
super down toe he prefers a simple
lifestyle and even does his own grocery
shopping love this smash the like button
share with your friends and drop a
comment below don't forget to subscribe
and hit the bell for more fun facts
about the world's greatest thinkers
